alert.note: Alert for Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:52AM EST until February 28 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Cumberland River at Williamsburg affecting Whitley County. For the Cumberland River...including Cumberland, Baxter, Pineville, Barbourville, Williamsburg...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cumberland River at Williamsburg. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 26.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.1 feet on 03/25/1993. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued at 11 PM on Thursday, February 24th.
